title: Subchapter B - Affordable Home Ownership Development Program
content:
Subchapter B - Affordable Home Ownership Development Program

State Regulations

Part 2160 - General Provisions (§ 2160.1 to 2160.2)

Part 2161 - Eligibility (§ 2161.1 to 2161.4)

Part 2162 - Grants (§ 2162.1 to 2162.4)

Part 2163 - Program Requirements (§ 2163.1 to 2163.2)

Part 2164 - Applications (§ 2164.1 to 2164.10)

Part 2165 - Evaluation Of Proposals (§ 2165.1 to 2165.2)

Part 2166 - Grant Award (§ 2166.1 to 2166.3)

Part 2167 - Drawdown Of Funds (§ 2167.1 to 2167.2)

Part 2168 - Program Income (§ 2168.1)

Part 2169 - Audit And Monitoring (§ 2169.1 to 2169.3)

Part 2170 - Reporting Requirements (§ 2170.1 to 2170.3)

Part 2171 - Project Close-out (§ 2171.1 to 2171.4)

Part 2172 - Program Or Project Performance (§ 2172.1 to 2172.3)

Part 2173 - Corrective And Remedial Actions (§ 2173.1 to 2173.2)

Part 2174 - Reduction Or Termination Of Grant (§ 2174.1)

Part 2175 - Implementation Of State Environmental Quality Review Act (§ 2175.1)

Part 2176 - Prompt Payment Policy Statement Of The N.y.s. Affordable Housing Corporation (§ 2176.1 to 2176.5)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
